messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring the success of Brexit to protect national interest, security, and economic prosperity. A strong negotiating position in Brussels is crucial for economic security.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.
issues.economy: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

housing.content: We will build where development is wanted, where homes are needed.

endorsements.endorsement: Strong and Stable Leadership for Bolton West and for Britain

quotes.text: Labour plots Brexit delay with other parties if Tories don't win election majority.

images.caption: A picture of Theresa May with a quote: 'Theresa May and Chris Green - Strong and Stable Leadership for Bolton West and for Britain.'
An image depicting 'A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN'.
